title: Connection Lost
body:
Hey Guys,
Three of my friends and I have the same problem.
Since patch 6.14 we are not able to log in.
I launch the game and when after i entered my name and pw
the game just says "logging on..." and after a minute pops up the bugsplat:
Connection Error

Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

I tried 
1. following the steps in the bugsplat
2. reinstall the patches
3. reinstall the game
4. renew my ip
5. disable the firewall
6. searched in the internet but didnt found people with the same problem after the patch came

Pls help us guys we need to get out of silver !

Why Nunu? Whyyyyyyy...?

replies.body: It sounds like the servers aren't able to connect and authenticate your login.  If Rineyy's suggestion doesn't work, we have a [Login Issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)guide that may help.  If the issue still persists, please reach out to our tech team by[ submitting a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Rineyy it doesnt work. 
None of the instructions.
